title: UNP hold Sathyagraha in Rambukkana
body_lines: The United National Party (UNP) held a Sathyagraha in Rambukkana against the killing of Chaminda Lakshan, who died during the recent protest in Rambukkana. UNP Deputy Leader Ruwan Wijewardene, General Secretary Palitha Range Bandara, National Organizer Sagala Ratnayake and party activists participated in the Sathyagraha. Pix by Praddep Pathirana
